00037 /*****************************************************************************/
00038 
00039 Sudoku::Sudoku(int basesize, SymbolType stype, CALLBACK callback){
00040   boardlength = basesize * basesize;
00041 
00042   if (stype == SYM_NUMBER){
00043     firstelement = '1';
00044     lastelement = '9';
00045   }
00046   else{
00047     firstelement = 'A';
00048     if (boardlength == 16)
00049       lastelement = 'P';
00050     else
00051       lastelement = 'Y';
00052   }
00053 
00054   info = callback;
00055 
00056   stats = SudokuStats();
00057   stats.basesize = basesize;
00058 
00059   for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00060     dupes[i] = -1;
00061 
00062 }

00077 /*****************************************************************************/
00088 /*****************************************************************************/
00089 
00090 void Sudoku::SetupBoard(const char *values, size_t size){
00091   boardmaxpos = size;
00092 
00093   for(unsigned i = 0; i < size; ++i)
00094   {
00095     char value = *values++;
00096     if (value == '.')
00097       board.push_back(' ');
00098     else
00099       board.push_back(value);
00100   }
00101 }

00103 /*****************************************************************************/
00111 /*****************************************************************************/
00112 
00113 void Sudoku::Solve(){
00114 
00115   if (callback(MSG_ABORT_CHECK, 0, firstelement))
00116     return;
00117 
00118   callback(MSG_STARTING, 0, firstelement);
00119 
00120   place_value(0, firstelement);
00121 }
00122 
00123 /*****************************************************************************/
00134 /*****************************************************************************/
00135 
00136 void Sudoku::insert_into_board(unsigned index, char value){
00137   board[index] = value;
00138   stats.moves++;
00139   stats.placed++;
00140 }
00141 
00142 /*****************************************************************************/
00153 /*****************************************************************************/
00154 
00155 void Sudoku::place_value(unsigned index, char value){
00156   if (callback(MSG_ABORT_CHECK, index, value))
00157     return;
00158   if (board[index] == ' '){
00159     insert_into_board(index, value);
00160     callback(MSG_PLACING, index, value);
00161   }
00162 
00163   if(!is_in_conflict(index)){
00164     if(is_final_position(index))
00165     {
00166       callback(MSG_FINISHED_OK, index, value);
00167       return;
00168     }
00169     else
00170     {
00171       while (board[index] != ' ')
00172         ++index;
00173       place_value(index, firstelement);
00174     }
00175   }
00176   if (is_in_conflict(index))
00177   {
00178     if (callback(MSG_ABORT_CHECK, index, value))
00179       return;
00180 
00181     if (value < lastelement)
00182     {
00183       board[index] = ' ';
00184       stats.placed--;
00185       callback(MSG_REMOVING, index, value);
00186       value++;
00187       place_value(index, value);
00188     }
00189     else
00190     {
00191       board[index] = ' ';
00192       stats.placed--;
00193       callback(MSG_REMOVING, index, value);
00194       stats.backtracks++;
00195       return;
00196     }
00197   }
00198   //callback(MSG_FINISHED_FAIL, index, value);
00199 }

00215 unsigned Sudoku::index_to_row(unsigned index) const{
00216   return index / (boardlength);
00217 }
00218 
00219 /*****************************************************************************/
00231 /*****************************************************************************/
00232 
00233 unsigned Sudoku::index_to_col(unsigned index) const{
00234   return index % boardlength;
00235 }

00237 /*****************************************************************************/
00250 /*****************************************************************************/
00251 
00252 unsigned Sudoku::row_col_to_index(unsigned row, unsigned col) const{
00253   return (row * boardlength) + col;
00254 }

00256 /*****************************************************************************/
00268 /*****************************************************************************/
00269 
00270 bool Sudoku::is_in_conflict(unsigned index) const{
00271   if (dupe_in_col(index) != -1)
00272     return true;
00273   else if (dupe_in_row(index) != -1)
00274     return true;
00275   else if (dupe_in_sqr(index) != -1)
00276     return true;
00277   else
00278     return false;
00279 }
00280 
00281 /*****************************************************************************/
00293 /*****************************************************************************/
00294 
00295 int Sudoku::dupe_in_row(unsigned index) const{
00296   unsigned row = index_to_row(index);
00297   unsigned rowstart = row_col_to_index(row, 0);
00298   unsigned rowend = rowstart + boardlength;
00299   for (unsigned i = rowstart; i < rowend; ++i){
00300     if (i != index && board[index] == board[i])
00301       return i;
00302   }
00303 
00304   return -1;
00305 }
00306 
00307 /*****************************************************************************/
00319 /*****************************************************************************/
00320 
00321 int Sudoku::dupe_in_col(unsigned index) const{
00322   unsigned col = index_to_col(index);
00323   unsigned colstart = row_col_to_index(0, col);
00324   unsigned colend = colstart + boardlength * (boardlength - 1);
00325   for (unsigned i = colstart; i < colend; i += boardlength){
00326     if (i != index && board[index] == board[i])
00327       return i;
00328   }
00329 
00330   return -1;
00331 }
00332 
00333 /*****************************************************************************/
00345 /*****************************************************************************/
00346 
00347 int Sudoku::dupe_in_sqr(unsigned index) const{
00348   unsigned sqrstart = find_sqr_start(index);
00349   unsigned i = sqrstart;
00350   unsigned sqrend = sqrstart + (boardlength*2 + stats.basesize);
00351   while (i < sqrend){
00352     if (i != index && board[index] == board[i])
00353       return i;
00354     // if at the last element in the square
00355     if ((i + 1) % stats.basesize == 0)
00356       // make next comparison to the first element in the next row of sqr
00357       i += boardlength - (stats.basesize - 1);
00358     else
00359       ++i;
00360   } 
00361 
00362   return -1;
00363 }
00364 
00365 /*****************************************************************************/
00377 /*****************************************************************************/
00378 
00379 unsigned Sudoku::find_sqr_start(unsigned index) const{
00380   // determine the first column of the sqr index is in
00381   unsigned sqrfirstcol = index_to_col(index - (index % stats.basesize));
00382   unsigned row = index_to_row(index);
00383   // determine the first row of the sqr the index is in
00384   unsigned sqrfirstrow = row - (row % stats.basesize);
00385   // return the index of the first (row,column);
00386   return row_col_to_index(sqrfirstrow, sqrfirstcol);
00387 }
00388 
00389 /*****************************************************************************/
00401 /*****************************************************************************/
00402 
00403 bool Sudoku::is_final_position(unsigned index) const{
00404   return index == boardmaxpos - 1;
00405 }
00406 
00407 /*****************************************************************************/
00417 /*****************************************************************************/
00418 
00419 void Sudoku::update_duplicates(unsigned index){
00420   dupes[0] = dupe_in_row(index);
00421   dupes[1] = dupe_in_col(index);
00422   dupes[2] = dupe_in_sqr(index);
00423   if (dupes[2] == dupes[0] || dupes[2] == dupes[1])
00424     dupes[2] = -1;
00425 }
00426 
00427 /*****************************************************************************/
00440 /*****************************************************************************/
00441 
00442 bool Sudoku::callback(MessageType message, unsigned index, char value){
00443 
00444   // find all the dupes for this index and assign to the array
00445   update_duplicates(index);
00446 
00447 
00448   return info(*this, board.c_str(), message, stats.moves, stats.basesize, index, value, dupes);
00449 }
